Lock device: Device Administrator

In order to lock the screen, we need to set WaveUp as a Device Administrator.

Once an app is a Device Administrator, you won't be able to uninstall it normally without revoking the Device Admin Permission.

If you wish to revoke the Device Admin Permission, just open WaveUp, go to the advanced options (upper right corner) and tap on 'Revoke Device Admin Permission'. Alternatively you can go to Settings → Security → Device Administrators and uncheck WaveUp.

If you wish to uninstall WaveUp just tap on the 'Uninstall WaveUp' button at the bottom of the app which revokes the Device Admin Privilege and directly uninstalls WaveUp.
